channel.title: [838] Public Chat help please!
channel.description:
So i really need help to fix the public chat when you type and enter it doesn't show the message above head someone please help me fix this, I've read all the posts on the public chat for 838 but i don't fully understand them, someone please without flaming and writing hate comments tell me how to fix this problem, im struggling with this.
thank you for your attention kind regards
